attributes.action: To Remove John Berco as Speaker Of The House
attributes.additional_details: Bercow clearly only selected from the 8 options the 4 most likely to disrupt the process & keep us in Europe. He is blatantly biased towards remain. The country voted leave & he’s doing all he can to affect that result
attributes.background: John Bercow is blatantly biased towards the Leave campaign & also overtly biased towards the Labour Party

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
